items.name: Ultrasonic Humidifier
items.text: Featuring a large water tank and colorful LED lights that change gradually, adding a soothing touch to any room. It helps alleviate dryness and improve air quality. Compact and quiet, it's easy to place on a desk or nightstand.
items.description: The perfect addition to any room in your home. Not only does its stylish, spherical design make it a perfect fit, but the cool, calming mist it releases can help you relax and de-stress. Its compact size makes it easy to place on a desk, nightstand, or shelf, so you can enjoy its benefits wherever you need them most. In addition to promoting relaxation, the humidifier's mist can also support immune health. Upgrade your home's atmosphere and your well-being with the spherical Mini Aromatherapy Humidifier.

items.name: Nano Humidifier
items.text: Find relaxation and relief. The Nano Humidifier features a variety of LED lights and has a sleek, compact design that fits easily into any room.
items.description: Find relaxation and relief from soothing, humid air with the Nano Humidifier, featuring a built-in atmospheric lamp. Its cool mist function helps soothe dry skin and respiratory issues, creating a comfortable and soothing atmosphere for relaxation. The atmospheric lamp adds a touch of ambiance to any space, making it the perfect choice for anyone looking to unwind after a long day. It comes in white, cyan, and pink.

items.name: Home Humivase
items.text: Fits into any aesthetic. Humivase's cooling steam promotes relaxation and immune health in the comfort of your own home.
items.description: The perfect addition to any room in your home. items.name: Aromatherapy Humidifier
items.text: The Aromatherapy's cooling steam de-stresses your body and strengthens your immune health. All while staying stylish and true to your home's decor.
